ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
numpy:
- '2'
python_min:
- '3.10'

about.description:
Arctic is a high performance datastore for numeric data. It supports
Pandas, numpy arrays and pickled objects out-of-the-box, with pluggable
support for other data types and optional versioning.

Arctic can query millions of rows per second per client, achieves ~10x
compression on network bandwidth, ~10x compression on disk, and scales
to hundreds of millions of rows per second per MongoDB instance.

Arctic has been under active development at Man AHL since 2012.
about.summary: High performance datastore for time series and tick data

about.description:
Arctic is a high performance datastore for numeric data. It supports
Pandas, numpy arrays and pickled objects out-of-the-box, with pluggable
support for other data types and optional versioning.

Arctic can query millions of rows per second per client, achieves ~10x
compression on network bandwidth, ~10x compression on disk, and scales
to hundreds of millions of rows per second per MongoDB instance.

Arctic has been under active development at Man AHL since 2012.
about.summary: High performance datastore for time series and tick data

name: arctic
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "arctic" %}
{% set version = "1.83.1" %}
{% set gitsha = "3cf2a9ce3a7f2c2544ececd20d0f4f5b917f7b2a" %}
{% set sha256 = "3ed90681bcd8c6058c2d858115710d9f3f893a3063325e15fed419612e68b7ff" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/manahl/arctic/archive/{{ gitsha }}.tar.gz
  sha256: {{ sha256 }}

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv --no-deps --no-build-isolation

requirements:
  host:
    - numpy <2
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - setuptools
    - setuptools-git
    - six
  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - decorator
    - enum-compat
    - mockextras
    - numpy
    - pandas <3
    - pymongo >=4
    - python-dateutil
    - pytz
    - six
    - tzlocal
    - lz4

test:
  imports:
    - arctic
  requires:
    - python {{ python_min }}

about:
  home: https://github.com/manahl/arctic
  license: LGPL-2.1-only
  license_family: GPL
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: High performance datastore for time series and tick data
  description: |
    Arctic is a high performance datastore for numeric data. It supports
    Pandas, numpy arrays and pickled objects out-of-the-box, with pluggable
    support for other data types and optional versioning.

    Arctic can query millions of rows per second per client, achieves ~10x
    compression on network bandwidth, ~10x compression on disk, and scales
    to hundreds of millions of rows per second per MongoDB instance.

    Arctic has been under active development at Man AHL since 2012.
  doc_url: https://arctic.readthedocs.io/en/latest/
  dev_url: https://github.com/manahl/arctic

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - timkpaine
    - birnbaum
    - mathiaseitz
    - trendelkampschroer
